identifier: made in the shade plano:dallas, tx

reviews.text: We are very with our shade purchase from Made in the Shade Plano.  Our first consultation was quick to arrange and since I already pretty much knew what I wanted, Kristie was able to make a couple of suggestions and we were ready to go.  Shipping did not take long and our shade was installed quickly.  I’m very pleased with the results, it’s exactly what I wanted for our sliding glass door.

We absolutely love our new window treatments! They’ve made a huge difference in the look and feel of our home. Kristie and Todd are great people friendly, knowledgeable, and incredibly professional. From the initial estimate to the final installation, the entire process was smooth, quick, and stress-free.
They took the time to help us choose the perfect, colors of blinds, shades, and shutters that complemented our interior. The installation was fast and hassle-free. We can’t speak highly enough

Wow! What a quick and easy experience. We used Made in the Shade (Kristie and Todd) for our business office. We were moving to a new construction, and window shades were just one of the many tasks I was juggling as we neared completion and our move date. Kristie walked me through the options gave recommendations and made the decision process so easy. Production was fast and install was seamless. We are already using them again for shutters. So happy with the experience.
Very professional. Competitive rates. Product made the house look exquisite. Look the finished look. Would recommend Kristy and her crew for any drapes/blinds related projects.

From start to finish, Kristie & Todd were fantastic to work with. They really listened to what I wanted and came back with creative solutions I hadn’t even thought of. The installation was smooth, the quality is outstanding, and the whole process felt effortless. I’m already planning to bring them back for more projects—when you find a company that makes your home look this good, you don’t let them go!

We used Made in the Shade Plano for several areas and had a great experience! They were very responsive to all communication, kept us informed along the process, and the installed shutters look fantastic! We are very thrilled with the outcome and experience!!

Kristie and Todd are amazing. They have great knowledge on window treatments and did a tremendously elegant job on our home. We ended up going with Roman shades throughout our home and settled with drapery in our formal areas and a few of our bedrooms as well. We couldn’t be more pleased. Highly recommend!

Highly recommend! Great costumer service and Kristi has a great eye for design. We were hung up on all the options, she took the time to listen to us and provide recommendations that we ended up loving. No other company shared ideas like she did. We did run into a delivery issue where the vendor sent the wrong color but she quickly corrected it with them and got the correct shades. Overall highly recommend!

The owner Kristie is an interior designer. She definitely  has good taste and gave great recommendations on the shades we purchased. She was professional and very helpful. The installation went smoothly and I love the result!

Our experience with Made in the Shade Plano has been fantastic! They are our first and only choice for beautiful plantation shutters and drapes. Kristie and Todd are top tier professionals for high quality products, design choice, and installation. We are very pleased with everything we purchased from them.
The Shade Pro team was very professional. They responded quickly and stuck to their schedule. Their work was super high quality. It made my backyard space so much more usable.

I highly recommend Made in the Shade Plano. We enjoyed working with Kristie and her husband. She has a design background, so it was great having her help me choose my window treatments and deciding what would be best for my place. They have a lot of options/materials to choose from, and when installation day came, everything was done so fast. I love how everything turned out!

We had a great experience with this company! There was a mix-up with our original order and the wrong shades were installed, but they handled it so professionally—reordered the correct ones, installed them at no extra cost, and even let us keep the original shades, which happened to fit perfectly in another room. Their prices were the most competitive we found, and they were honest and precise about turnaround times, which we really appreciated. Everyone we worked with was friendly, communicativ

We had an amazing experience using Kristie at Made In The Shade! From our initial consultation and deciding on fabrics/designs to installation, Kristie and her team were fabulous! We are thrilled with the result of our shutters and shades!

I got 6 quotes and they beat them all. Not only did they promise to deliver in half the time of anyone else, they delivered 5 days sooner than promised. I have high standards and couldn’t be happier with the quality and installation. Kristie and Todd were very personable and a pleasure to work with. Top notch. Look no further.

Kristi was wonderful ! She’s professional and personable. She showed up on time and her quote was very reasonable. I decided to break up the window treatments into rooms. I just had my plantation shutters installed in the front of the home and they are gorgeous ! Can’t wait to start my master bedroom next ! Highly recommended!

Kristie and Todd did a wonderful job on our roller shades and curtains. There price quote was lower than the quote we got from another window treatment company for the same brand of shades. They even installed the temporary shades for two rooms while we wait for the shade installation.From price estimation to actual installation,the entire process went really good. We have zero complaints and would absolutely recommend them for anyone looking for window treatments.

Absolutely loved my experience and the final product with Made in the Shade! Kristie was so helpful in selecting the right product and material for each of my spaces and sent a bid over quickly. Todd was very precise in measurements and installation. The whole process was quick and pleasant. Plus, they’re both nice people to be around! Highly recommend!

Kristie and Todd helped us initially with our kitchen shades, and after seeing how great they came out, we decided to do our bathroom as well. The design process was super simple and quick, with plenty of options. The installation was also very timely and perfectly measured. Their rates are reasonable and we felt good with using a local business for our projects. We are very happy with their work and highly recommend!
Kristie and Todd were extremely helpful during the entire process, from material selection to final install. Everything went according to plan and the result is fantastic!
Kristie and Todd are the best! They have done a variety of widow treatments for me. They have great products and deliver a personal touch. I highly recommend them!!

Kristie and Todd were very easy to work with! Timely, communicative, and helpful. There was a manufacturing error in part of our order but they immediately reordered with zero drama. Half of our order was motorized and Kristie took her time calibrating everything perfectly. I will definitely be reaching back out to them when we are ready to upgrade the rest of our house.

Kristie and Todd were awesome! Kristie came over for an in-home consult and color-matched our roller shades to our walls BEAUTIFULLY! It took a few weeks for the shades to get here once they ordered them, and we quickly scheduled Todd to come out to install them. Couldn’t recommend Made in the Shade enough!

We’ve worked with Kristie on several projects, and she has consistently been prompt, courteous, and reliable. Her communication is excellent, with clear timelines and transparent pricing every step of the way. We truly appreciate her professionalism and the ease of working with her!

I highly recommend Made in the shade Plano. Kristie and Todd are awesome and great to work with. The communication was great and the whole process was really easy. The blinds turned out amazing and made such a difference on our house.

Kristie and Todd are great! They have quality products, help with nice design ideas, and are very professional. They are flexible with scheduling and will help in any way they can. I’m a repeat customer, and that says it all!
Great experience. Kristie is great to work with and we had our new shades very quickly. Highly recommend!
My shades turned out great. I got light filtering cordless shades in 3 rooms of my house in the Summer White fabric/color, and I love them! They did a great job!
Working with Kristie and Todd was a pleasure. Prompt and professional during the entire process. My shades look great!

We recently had custom wooden shutters installed in both our home and office by Made in the Shade and we couldn’t be happier with the results! From the initial consultation to the installation, the entire process was smooth and professional. The team took the time to understand our needs and helped us select the perfect style and finish to match our spaces.

The quality of the shutters is exceptional – they not only look beautiful but also feel sturdy and well-crafted. Installation was quick and

Todd and Kristie are awesome! They were so helpful throughout the whole process and made sure everything went smoothly. Electronic shades turned out perfect and made my house look great. Highly recommend!
My new draperies and wovens are beautiful. Kristie was so helpful in picking out the right color/patterns, and install was a breeze. Highly recommend Kristie and Todd.

I’m so happy to have found Made in the Shade Plano. Kristie is fantastic to work with. She’s very helpful and insightful and offered great suggestions. Her interior design background and vision is a plus and helped me visualize. The shades I bought are terrific and really finish off both rooms. There’s no high pressure sales. Just good quality and professional care. Thank you Kristie and Todd!

We had a great experience with Made in the Shade. From start to finish, they were professional, organized, and easy to work with. The process was truly turn-key, and the options they offered were a perfect fit for our space. We absolutely love our new shades—both the look and the functionality exceeded expectations. Highly recommend this team to anyone looking for a hassle-free experience and high-quality results.

I highly recommend them A+.

Todd and Kristie did a great job! I love my new shades for my living room provided by Made in The Shade Plano. Kristie and Todd did excellent service from helping me select the right window covering to installation. I am happy with my new shades!!
Kristie has been great to work with. Very knowledgeable and did an amazing job on the shades for my new house. Highly recommend Kristie with  made in the shade Plano.

Todd and Kristi did an amazing job! They made the process seamless. If you are looking to upgrade or purchase window treatments they will take care of you and I would highly recommend them. We couldn’t be happier with the outcome!
We’ve had great experiences in multiple homes. All the way from the measuring, helping choose the best color and type and installation. Highly recommend!
Made in the Shade was so wonderful to work with. We love our shutters and shades. They were also helpful with what fabric/color would go with our decor.
5 stars due to service and price! Kristie was very responsive anytime I needed help or questions answered. I highly recommend Made in the Shade Plano for shutters!

I recently purchased roller shades for my home, and I couldn't be happier with the entire experience! From the moment I reached out, Kristie and Todd made everything seamless and enjoyable. Kristie, with her impeccable eye for interior design, helped me choose shades that not only matched my décor but elevated the entire look of my rooms. She truly understands how to balance style with functionality.

Todd was just as impressive. He came over to take measurements and ensured everything was absol

We recently had motorized shades installed in our bedrooms and are so glad we chose Made in the Shade to work with! They were knowledgeable as well as prompt and attentive from start to finish, and we couldn’t be more pleased with the outcome. We will definitely use them again when the need arises. Highly recommend!

Todd and Kristie have been phenomenal - helpful, timely, and very responsive. They are available for design consultation (Kristie has a great eye!) and deliver a high quality product. They have a wide variety of products to choose from, so you can easily pick based on both aesthetic and functionality.
We had our shades installed in 2022 and are still very pleased with them. When I reached out to them regarding 1-2 minor issues over the past 2 years, they were immediately responsive and accommoda

Kristy and Todd are a great team to work with. They offered a wide range of solutions for our needs at a reasonable price.
Communication was swift and any issues were quickly troubleshooted.

Don't waste your time researching other vendors for your window covering needs.  Kristie and Todd are simply the best.  Extremely nice people.  Very professional and easy to work with.  We've used them for several projects so far and they'll continue to be our vendor for future needs.  Made in the Shade is the one to choose!
The whole process from the initial design to installation was well communicated and painless. I would highly recommend Made in the Shade for your project. They exceeded my expectations.
They are extremely helpful and Kristie’s taste in helping with choosing fabrics is wonderful.  The work is perfection and I highly recommend them.

From the first meeting with Kristie, to the install day, everything and every step in between was flawless. We love our shutters so much, couldn’t believe we lived without them for so long. We are very happy with our choice to use Made in the Shade Plano, and I would recommend highly!

I recently had the pleasure of working with Kristi and Todd, and I couldn’t be happier with the results! From start to finish, their professionalism and attention to detail were evident. I highly recommend them and will be reaching out to them again for future window coverings!

Had an amazing experience with Kristie and Todd! They were both easy to work with and had great ideas during the initial consultation. They also went out of their way to make sure my order fit my house the way we hoped, and worked with me when the initial order didn’t turn out the way we had hoped. Todd was also great during the installs, and so easy to talk to. You’ll likely have many options when it comes to window treatments, but I highly recommend MITS because of Kristie and Todd
